Reviews.Title: “The Good and the Bad-what a horrible night!”
Reviews.Author: bicycle53
Reviews.Content: The good - the staff were very pleasant - and after seeing all of the concrete - I agree with sunsetkeysusie this time - I wanted our payment returned. Since this was not allowable the staff very kindly offered an upgrade to the cottages, which we felt was more than compensating. Ours had the best view and the rooms were clean and pleasant. But no phone, and this is important. The bad - it was Saturday night and the club near the cottages played non-stop pounding music until 5 am, the last cars and motorcycles left at 5:30. I only slept from 9:30 until 1 am when the pounding woke me up. This is not the nature experience that we had received the night before in another hotel. We were told security guards are around - that was not our experience aound the cottages. We only saw a few cars parked that next morning from those that stayed at this hotel. We got the same impression as prevous reviewers. We should have read them more carefully. Never again. I will say one of the staff left a message wanting to interview us as to our harrowing experience. When I called the number, the person hung up and I tried a half of dozen times and left my message and contact information. Never a return call. I then decided to write this review after giving them the benefit of contacting me but no response. I know there are some very nice people that work there - in the restaurant and at the desk but this was not what we were looking for.......

Reviews.Title: “Sitting in my prison room”
Reviews.Author: leisuresusie
Reviews.Content: I have not been in prison. This has to be what it is like. You walk in the entrance and all you see is concrete. The chairs by the pool all 6 of them are in bad shape. The vendong machines all say out of order. This hotel should be too. I hate for anyone to go out of business nut this is on the way. We are the only people here. That alone is scary. Treasure Island what a joke. Prison Island is more like it.

Reviews.Title: “Disappointed”
Reviews.Author: RevRuth L
Reviews.Content: I thought the Hotel had changed, according to its new publicity, but it has not. Got there at 9:00 and there was only a security guard, no registrar, no keys to a reserved room....an hour of wait for the already paid room to be opened. Only 5 rooms occupied with people in the whole place.....hhhmmmmm. Sounds bad.... I will never go there anymore. I didn't feel safe there. In the morning, I only saw executives leaving alone, like if it was a secluded romance encounter for lovers. shame, shame shame.....

Reviews.Title: “Nice location but needs to be run better....”
Reviews.Author: PhillyRubio
Reviews.Content: This hotel in Cidra is well-hidden and has some beautiful scenery. I was there for a week, using the hotel as a base to explore Puerto Rico. I was dissapointed that I had to ask 2xs for the room to be cleaned and during the week "breakfast included" was a small ham and cheese sandwich and coffee. I am ok with continental breakfast but this was pushing it. One of the days, they forgot breakfast altogether. Also, if you are planning to sleep on the weekend, dont expect much rest with the club playing blasting music until after 4am!! The staff was professional and polite and the rooms were clean but basic....

Reviews.Title: “OMG”
Reviews.Author: GRATEFUL61
Reviews.Content: The beds were great, the hotel was clean, the personel was awesome (especially Ichi and Jose from Chicago), the pool was clean and plenty of good people to talk to and socialize. The domino games and social activities were great. The food was also great The ONLY thing I think they could provide is a coffeemaker and small refrigerator. Thank you everyone at the Treasure Island for making our family vacation GREAT.

Reviews.Title: “Perfect place for holidays”
Reviews.Author: Lulana
Reviews.Content: We stayed 8 days with our family, divided in three cabins. The personnel is very friendly, the restaurant veeery gooood! It is a pleasure to have a drink in the bar terrace enjoying the lake view. the cabins are well clean, the furniture is beautiful, good tv size with cable, but the best part is the lake view from the cabin. Can visit different places in town and in the night, on Christmas time, can enjoy the town plaza great decorations! We were looking for a quality time with our family and had it. Right now we are making a reservation for next week.

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Treasure Island
HotelInfo.Address: Carr. 172 Interior Kilometer 13.5 | Barrio. Bayamon, Cidra 00739, Puerto Rico
